1. Sale of immovable property for Rs.33,00,000-00 in letters thirty three lakh rupees-
2. The. Dated 17-12-2025 -
3. Subscribed by:- Palnadu District, Vinukonda Municipality, Vinukonda Town, Sanjay Gandhinagar,

Madhavi Garu
Submitted by:- Palnadu District, Vinukonda Municipality, Vinukonda Town, Markapuram Road,
Near Ayyappa Swamy Temple, Door No. 4-654/79/4 Son of Bommidi Durga Rao, resident of Kapurastudu, Srinivasa Rao - 4. The immovable property as per the schedule below was sold by Gunji Venkataratnam on 30-05-2023 and transferred to Vinukonda S.R.O. I have inherited the rights as registered in the 1st Book No. 7981/2023 and have been given the full possession and enjoyment of the immovable property as per the schedule below for the needs of my family as per the current prevailing prices. I have sold it to you today for Rs. 33,00,000-00 and as a result of the sale you have given me Rs. 2,00,000-00 in cash in the presence of the mediators. The balance purchase price of Rs.31,00,000-00 is one lakh rupees in letters, if you pay it to me within 2 months from this date, i.e. by 17-02-2026, I can register it in your name or in the name of the person you request at your own expense. If the deadline is exceeded, you will pay me interest at the rate of Rs.1-50 paise per hundred per month. I can clear all the mortgages, etc. in relation to the Scheduled Property at my own expense and register it in the name of the person you request. This is a written agreement for the sale of immovable property with my consent. 5. Schedule:- Palnadu D., Narasaraopet Sub-D., Vinukonda Sub-D., Vinukonda Municipality, Vinukonda

Eighteen lakhs and twenty thousand rupees have been paid to me in cash today in the presence of the mediators and the full consideration for the sale property has been received by me from you. I hereby transfer the sale property to you with all rights and duties. The municipal taxes etc. on the sale property shall be borne by you from now on. By paying, you shall enjoy the entire right of sale of the property as you wish, with all due rights. If you do so, neither you nor your heirs nor I nor my heirs will be able to make any disputes or disputes in the future. Whatever disputes or disputes may arise in the future regarding this property, I will avoid them at my own expense and will continue to execute the property under you without any hindrance. I have sold the property to you on the assurance that I have not committed any encroachments on it and that it has not been given as security to any government or private institution. sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 7981 of 2023, dated 31/May/2023, executed by Gunji Venkata Rathnam in favour of Bommidi Srinivasarao towards the property admeasuring an extent of 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828, comprised in survey number 271/1A1, situated in Vinukonda Village, Vinukonda Muncipality within the District of Palnadu registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda is bounded as follows: North by: Gunji Ankamma Rao's house-area measuring A.46-0. South by: Gummadi Chinna Yalamanda's house-area measuring A.46-0. East by: Gandikota Prasad Gari's house-site measuring A.21-8s. West by: Municipal cement road site measuring A.21-8s.

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 271/1A1, bearing house no. 19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828, situated in Vinukonda measuring about 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Gunji Venkata Rathnam, who acquired the property through Schedule-B of Partition deed Vide Document No. 6639 of 2021. [Ref. Deed & EC] 2. The aforementioned Gunji Venkata Rathnam executed a Sale Deed on 31/May/2023, registered as document No. 7981 of 2023, before the SRO Vinukonda in favour of Bommidi Srinivasarao towards the property measuring 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., bearing house no.19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828, comprised in survey no. 271/1A1, situated at Vinukonda. 4. Thereupon, the said Bommidi Srinivasarao executed an Agreement of Sale (Un-Registered) dated 17/Dec/2025 in favour of Gunji Madhavi for the sale of the property admeasuring an extent of 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., [Part of Pledging Deed - To be Executed] 5. Thus, once a Sale Deed is executed by the said Bommidi Srinivasarao in favour of Gunji Madhavi in pursuant to the above Agreement of Sale, the said Gunji Madhavi, will become the owner of the property admeasuring an extent of 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828, Comprised in survey no. 271/1A1, situated at Vinukonda. [Pledging Deed – To be Executed] Note: It is to be noted that the Sale Deed is to be executed within 2 Months, from the date of execution of this AOS, hence, F.I. is to verify the same and get the Sale Deed executed within the limitation period. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : The Property Tax Receipt No. 07/2025-26/14179, dated 14/Jul/2025, imprinted by the Vinukonda Municipality discloses that Gunji Venkata Ratnam has paid property tax for the period 01/Apr/2025 to 31/Mar/2026 towards house number 19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828.

The property tax receipt attached discloses that Gunji Venkata Rathnam is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Bommidi Srinivasarao.

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I. policy and have concluded that the Bommidi Srinivasarao, holds the right to execute the Sale Deed in favour of Gunji Madhavi towards the property admeasuring 110.70 Sq. Yds. (or) 996.3 Sq. Ft., bearing house number.19-818/1/1, Assessment number 1131013828, in survey no. 271/1A1, situated at Vinukonda Village, Vinukonda Muncipality within the District of Palnadu registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda. And, the purchaser, Gunji Madhavi, will get the right, title, and interest over the schedule property upon execution of the Registered Sale Deed in his favour by the current owner Bommidi Srinivasarao.

Further, the prospective purchaser, Gunji Madhavi, shall be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant, Gunji Purushotham.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
